text: (Sample from 750ml bottle @ Koelschip tasting, May 11/17) Pours hazy light gold. Aroma is beautifully tart and heavily floral passion fruit, its not as musky as Im used to, but instead feels fresh, bright and juicy. Sweet, with a citrusy backbone. Flavour is also so wonderfully floral and fruity, perfumed, lovely, with supporting accents of sweet peach/mango, but balanced with a tart lemon/orange acidity. Soft bitterness. Light oak and hay characteristics let the lambic base shine through. Medium bodied, soft carbonation that slightly prickles. Maybe the Spontan series has somewhat reduced the apparent novelty of lambic like this, but this is the real deal and superbly well executed, very high quality fruit. Loved this!

From 750 ml bottle, v2015, at Koelschip, Copenhagen. Light hazy golden orange color with off white head. Yeasty and light malty aroma, funky, dusty, heavy fruity, tart fruity, tropical fruits, passion fruit, stone fruits, nectarine. Sweet and acidic fruity taste like aroma. Medium oily body, dry with soft carbonation. Amazing!

Bottle @ Koelschip. Hazy golden with small off-white head. Aroma is malt, fruit, little lemon, passion fruits, and tart. Flavour is malt, fruit, little tart, little sour, passion fruits, barnyard and lemon
Pierwszy wyraźnie octowy Bokkereyder. Kwasowość w stylu Hanssens, nie moja bajka.

Bottle at mikkeller and friend.. Golden amber. M funk fruit.. Soft herbal.. Real passion fruit.. Fresh passion fruit nose.. Ling fink.. Sharp acidity of passion fruit.. Long tart fruits.. This was bit of wow.. Not my kind of beer but really fresh passion fruit Earlier Rating: 7/5/2016 Total Score: 3.3Keg at cbc16.. Hazy Amber. M thin white lacing soft floral peach herbal fruit nose.. Soft herbal fruit.. Light acetic prickle.. Soft fruits
Bottle. Pours clear yellow. Aroma is passionfruit. Taste is passionfruit sweet, mid-high acidity, touch of tartness.
Bottle @ Koelschip. Hazy golden with a small white head. Aroma is sweet, malty, passion, lemon and barnyard. Flavor is medium sweet and rather acidic. Dry and rather acidic finish. 110517

Bottle @ Mikkeller & Friends. Pours slightly hazy dark golden with a small white head. Aroma of sourness, tart fruit, rich passionfruit. Flavor is sour, wood, barnyard, rich passion fruit. Medium to full body, soft carbonation, acidic and tart fruity finish. 110517
Pour from Jan. Pours hazy golden. Aroma of huge passion fruits, acetic, slight note of barn, notes of minerals, citrusy, lemon. Taste is heavy passion fruits, lemon, barn, heavy sour way sour.

75 cl bottle. Pours clear and golden yellow with a small white head. Aroma is solid passion fruity from a distance. Dense passion fruity like. Mellow and lingering fruity dense. Solid fruity and passion fruity thick finish. Oily and thick.

From bottle served blind by the goat himself. Pours full on bright orange with a small white head. Aroma has a fuckton of passionfruit. Immediately recognized the sweet tropical flavours of that beautiful fruit. Next on comes the acidic citrussy notes, lemony, pear, mango with a nice barnyardy tannic and forresty funky backnote. Taste is more acidic, still has a bunch of sweet passion fruit and acidity from the fruit but also lots of orange, light vinegar, some lactic acidity, leathery and funky finish. God damn!
Pours Golden yellow, aromas of passionfruit and Seabuckthorn. Juicy mouthfeel and a long finish of stonefruit and passionfruit! Very crisp and balanced acidity

From bottle. Pours a slight hazy golden. Aroma has intense, acidic passion fruit, lovely acidic funk, super leathery. Taste is very acidic, but also very leathery dry, light oaky, not a whole lot of passion in the taste, tiny grainy aftertaste. Very complex!

Sample @ CBC Boston, 2016. Slightly hazy gold pour with a small head. Nice tropical stone fruit on the nose. Bright and engaging. Plenty of meaty passionfruit, and some mildly cheesy pineapple. Somewhat sharper, more acidic profile than other Bokkereyder beers Ive tried. Some mellow bucolic funk accents. Mild oak and brett. Light body, moderate carb. Great effort.

Bottle @ CBC 2016 [ Red Session ]. - Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, Oksnehallen Vesterbro, Halmtorvet 11, 1700 Copenhagen, Denmark. [ As Bokkereyder Oscar One ].Unclear medium orange yellow color with a average, frothy, fair lacing, mostly diminishing, off-white to white head. Aroma is moderate malty, pale malt, funky, barnyard, leather, tart, grapes - apple, passion fruit - tart passion fruit - tropical fruit. Flavor is moderate sweet and acidic with a long duration, tropical fruit - passion fruit - peach, funky, barnyard, tart grapes - apples, dry. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft to flat. [20160514]
UPDATED: OCT 16, 2016 Bottle - pours gold white head - nose/taste of fresh passionfruit, sour funk, white wine, oak, hay - medium body. Beautifully balanced.

Clear warm golden colour, white head. Aroma of passion fruit, loads of passion fruit. Some nice funk, buttermilk and white wine notes of the lambic, but loads of space for the tropical fruits. Sour flavour, warm fruity passion fruit, apricot. Finish passion fruit, nectar. Lovely stuff, absolutely brilliant!!(from 75cL bottle @ De Nacht van de Grote Dorst, Itterbeek. Thanks for sharing, Raf!!)
Bottle @ De Prael. Passion fruit and yoghurt in the aroma. Golden color, hazy. Sour flavor with passion fruit, lemon and hints of oak. Good!
Bottle. Hazy to cloudy golden color, fluffy white head. Massive passionfruit aroma with dust and funk. Taste is dusty overripe tropical fruit, dry kiwi finish. Wow.

[5/14/16] Bottle sample at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Red session. Hazy golden. Aroma of funk, huge fruitiness (passion fruit). Tart flavor, funky, with juicy passion fruit. Quite light-bodied. Really great.
CBC2016. Trübes orange goldenes Bier. Geruch säuerlich fruchtig, Kraut, holzig. Geschmack säuerlich fruchtig, Kraut, Gewürze, holzig.

Bottle sampled at Koelschip. Very hazy light orange with a small white head. Aroma of soft subdued passionfruit, vinous notes, tart grapes, light vinous/wine barrel notes, a light funk and other fruit characters, light peach notes, a touch of mango. Flavour is moderate sour. Light medium bodied with soft carbonation.
